title: New to the boards! Opinions on this Cobb T206
author: HawkeyeAlum03

posts.post_title: New to the boards! Opinions on this Cobb T206
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone!

I have been reading posts on here for awhile and finally decided to join the boards. I am gettin my feet wet in the vintage arena and wanted some opinions on this so pardon my ignorance...

A pastor in my town has this card for sale. He wants $575 for it. It is a Piedmont back and obviously trimmed. Questions? Thoughts? How is the price? 

I would appreciate any expertise on this. Thank you :D

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=19436&d=1274713616[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=19437&d=1274713631[/IMG]
Hi, welcome aboard. I would recommend reposting this on the net54 homepage forum and you will get plenty of responses. This section is for people actively selling/trading cards.  Good luck
